name: The Red Whisper Of The Shadows
name_original: The Red Whisper Of The Shadows
description:
The Red Whisper of The Shadows!

★★★   I would recommend  downloading the game!   ★★★

As it will run faster making it easier to play and the graphics are much better!  

Game Controls: 

Player and Plot:

You play as Red Bug trying to recuse your lost children, while  escaping the dark forest!

Enemies:

There are Six level in total consisting of  two enemies types and special boss character!

The small bugs will simply be an obstacle for the player to 

avoid or shoot but the large bugs will target the player so be careful! 

If played the game and enjoyed it let know me!

If you like my art or want to see game updates check out my social medias:
